hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT PERSON_ID, PERSON_NUMBER, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID, CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CREATION_DATE, TO_CHAR(FROM_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS FROM_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS TO_DATE, EMPLOYMENT_COMPANY_ORG_ID, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, CONTRACT_DAYS_WITH_ECMS, CUSTOMER_SUPPORT, TO_CHAR(DATE_OF_BIRTH, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, ECMS_ACCOUNT_MGR_ID, ECMS_CS_CONSULTANT_ID, ECMS_PAYROLL_CONSULTANT_ID, EMPLOYMENT_TYPE, TO_CHAR(FIRST_ASSIGNMENT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS FIRST_ASSIGNMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(FIRST_CONTACT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS FIRST_CONTACT, FIRST_NAME, FULL_NAME, FUNCTION, GENDER, GTM_PROFILE, GTM_STAGE, LAFHA_AMOUNT, LAFHA_ELIGIBLE, TO_CHAR(LAFHA_LEASE_EXPIRY, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAFHA_LEASE_EXPIRY, LIFE_CYCLE_STAGE, MARITAL_STATUS, TO_CHAR(MEMBER_SINCE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS MEMBER_SINCE, MIDDLE_NAME, PAYROLL_NOTES, PAYSLIP_EMAIL, PERSONAL_COMMENT_ID, PERSON_TYPE, PREFERRED, PREFERRED_NAME, PREFIX, PREVIOUS_EMPLOYMENT_MODEL, PRIMARY_PERSON_TYPE_ID, REFERENCE_NO, REFERENCE_NO_2, REFERENCE_NO_3, REFERRAL_ID, REFERRAL_ORGANISATION_ID, RESIGNATION_COMMENT_ID, TO_CHAR(RESIGNATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS RESIGNATION_DATE, RESIGNATION_REASON, SERVICE_STATUS, SERVICE_TYPE, SKILLS, SURNAME, TITLE FROM HP_PERSON_D WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO HP_PERSON_D ( PERSON_ID, PERSON_NUMBER, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, FROM_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, TO_DATE, EMPLOYMENT_COMPANY_ORG_ID, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, CONTRACT_DAYS_WITH_ECMS, CUSTOMER_SUPPORT, DATE_OF_BIRTH, ECMS_ACCOUNT_MGR_ID, ECMS_CS_CONSULTANT_ID, ECMS_PAYROLL_CONSULTANT_ID, ) VALUES ( ${PERSON_ID}, ${PERSON_NUMBER}, ${BUSINESS_GROUP_ID}, ${CREATED_BY}, ${CREATION_DATE}, ${FROM_DATE}, ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ${TO_DATE}, ${EMPLOYMENT_COMPANY_ORG_ID}, ${ATTRIBUTE3}, ${ATTRIBUTE4}, ${ATTRIBUTE5}, ${ATTRIBUTE6}, ${ATTRIBUTE7}, ${ATTRIBUTE8}, ${CONTRACT_DAYS_WITH_ECMS}, ${CUSTOMER_SUPPORT}, ${DATE_OF_BIRTH}, ${ECMS_ACCOUNT_MGR_ID}, ${GTM_STAGE}, ${LAFHA_AMOUNT}, ${LAFHA_ELIGIBLE}, ${LAFHA_LEASE_EXPIRY}, ${LIFE_CYCLE_STAGE}, ${MARITAL_STATUS}, ${MEMBER_SINCE}, ${MIDDLE_NAME}, ${PAYROLL_NOTES}, ${PAYSLIP_EMAIL}, ${PERSONAL_COMMENT_ID}, ${PERSON_TYPE}, ${PREFERRED}, ${PREFERRED_NAME}, ${PREFIX}, ${PREVIOUS_EMPLOYMENT_MODEL}, ${PRIMARY_PERSON_TYPE_ID}, ${REFERENCE_NO}, ${REFERENCE_NO_2}, ${REFERENCE_NO_3}, ${REFERRAL_ID}, ${REFERRAL_ORGANISATION_ID}, ${RESIGNATION_COMMENT_ID}, ${RESIGNATION_DATE}, ${RESIGNATION_REASON}, ${SERVICE_STATUS}, ${SERVICE_TYPE}, ${SKILLS}, ${SURNAME}, ${TITLE} )

UPDATE HP_PERSON_D SET PERSON_NUMBER = ${PERSON_NUMBER}, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID = ${BUSINESS_GROUP_ID}, CREATED_BY = ${CREATED_BY}, CREATION_DATE = ${CREATION_DATE}, FROM_DATE = ${FROM_DATE},
